document_data.mainbody:
aint Vetheera was a virtuous, holy person of Oghma.
The servant of the Lord of Knowledge was honored as a saint. Vetheera wrote a book known as The Sum of Theology, which became available at Candlekeep.
Other than their written work, not much was known about Vetheera.
After the ogre named Little One donned a headband of intellect, he became a genius, and traveled to Candlekeep. He picked up Saint Vetheeras book, and studied it in the Hearth, gaining the respect and welcome of the resident scholars.
